name: Return (limq012@hotmail.com)
description: Return is a 2D action platform game, which players are going to be a powerful hero at the beginning, but gradually lose their abilities. This game is a level-down pattern. Players will choose to abandon one of their abilities at each level. Finally, the player will have to pass the level without any abilities. Players will face traps and enemies during the game. The levels are designed to be passable without any special abilities, but the abilities will make the game much easier.
